title: DIN Style Font
content:
Hi everyone!

Can anyone ID this DIN not DIN style font?

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193220im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4105.jpg)
author: mixedmoods

comments.content: words+pictures [Domo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193220/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/words-pictures/domo) might work but I don't seen any lighter weight... [Whinter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193220/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheticals/whinter) is not so bad too...

Domo is close Ryuk but the /Z/ is off.

Looks to me like...

monoMMM\_5

[http://www.ffonts.net/monoMMM\_5.font?text=GEZI](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193220/http:/www.ffonts.net/monoMMM_5.font?text=GEZI "http://www.ffonts.net/monoMMM\_5.font?text=GEZI")
You're right 5star, Domo /Z (and /I) is (a bit) off but monoMMM\_5 /R is off too :)
Thanks to both of you anyway!
